headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Everest Group (EG) Equal-Weight Recommendation

raw.headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Everest Group (EG) Equal-Weight Recommendation

headline: Everest Group Recognizes Shift Technology as a Top 10 High Potential Payment Integrity Specialist
summary: Shift Technology, the leading AI platform for insurance,, today announced it has been named a "Top 10 High Potential Payment Integrity Specialist" by industry research firm Everest Group. In the report Reshaping Payment Integrity Solutions: Specialists Creating Buzz in the Market, Shift is recognized as one of 10 companies that are redefining the payment integrity landscape and that have the potential to disrupt the market with innovative and forward-looking solutions.
